entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
